long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save any content from the web with Curate on Wiser. Pin any content with your notes, select relevant categories, and  add it to your curation. Access all your favourite curations through the Wiser app.

Don’t copy and paste links to your friends – just add them to the curation they’re following!

Ever wondered what your mentor has been reading lately? Content discovery shouldn’t be about sorting through the myriad of web pages or clickbait headlines. You can easily access the sophisticated selection of content that your community of tastemakers have bookmarked.

Pin any page on the web
Whatever you’re reading, watching, or listening to, Wiser Extension allows you to save it to your collection of content immediately.

Curate and categorise your favourite content
Art, political science, tech, media literacy… Pick a category for your content, and shelf them in your own unique content library through your curations.

Share your curations with your community and discover what inspires them
Curate on Wiser allows you to easily share what’s inspired you with your community of friends, family, aficionados and experts.

GREAT FOR
- Cataloguing content that you like
- Creating a customised syllabus for yourself, friends, and your community
- Curations tailored for the occasion, be it practical recipes for dinner or basic information about a place you’re visiting
- Starting quality conversations with your community
- Becoming the most interesting person at the dinner table
